attributes.action: Keep schools closed until at least September to protect our children & families
attributes.additional_details: Schools cannot control the transmission of Nits what make the Government think they can control Covid 19. There is no statistics showing how many infections have occurred in the schools that have been open for Front Line workers. The Government should open up the testing to ALL that have symptoms.
attributes.background: Protect the population by keeping schools closed until at least September as social distancing cannot work in schools the example in Denmark seen on television the children are standing next each other to wash hands. The 1st June is too soon to see if the reduction taken has caused a new spike in R.
